name: Void Blaster (Xarl23)
description:
Void Blaster is a Retro Style Space Shooter that hearkens back to the Arcade Games of the 70s, with a twist in its movement system.

Dodge a flurry of bullets, weaving back and forth between enemies to shoot back at just the right time. Things may seem easy at first, but each wave is less forgiving, allowing you less and less time to defeat all of the enemies before reinforcements arrive.

Collect power-ups ranging from super speed, to temporary invincibility in order to survive even longer.

There is no end goal, other than to survive as long as you can.  Try to get the highest point score possible before dying, then compare it to your previous best and see if you can beat it.

FEATURES

- Easy to learn, simple controls

- Scaling difficulty to keep things interesting

- An array of pickups to buff your ship

- Waves of enemies that become more hectic over time

- A high score screen to challenge your personal best

- Nostalglic, retro-style pixel graphics
